titles.title: Fixing Our Country Roads Act
Fixing Our Country Roads Act
A bill to amend title 40, United States Code, to authorize the expansion of the Appalachian development highway system.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary:
Fixing Our Country Roads Act
This bill directs the Department of Transportation to establish the total number of miles that may be authorized for the expansion of the Appalachian development highway system.
